text:
Partnership with Rotary is a go :raised_hands:🥳

I had a confirmation from the Rotary covid task force  chair of Ethiopia

 Rotary  has been functional in Ethiopia for over 60 years and have assisted the country in many impactful projects.
Rotray family includes Rotary, Rotaract and interact. There are many clubs and volunteers within the country and have one country office.

 Currently Rotary is  already working on the ground and  has different partnership to combat COVID.Most of the resources used so far have come from local clubs and WHO has also assisted.

The two main focuses they  picked supporting MoH or  the national health service by;
 a) protecting its personnel from being infected themselves and 
b) equipping them with  necessary hard and software  that can increase their productivity and efficacy. 

How can they support us 

1, Have right partnership
(Rotary have designed strategies and action initiatives which are very much appreciated and recognized by the counter parts: the ministty of health and ministry of peace)

2.Have legal mandate in Ethiopia as a registered not for profit, non-political and non-religious network of volunteers (hence Several members and groups in the Ethiopian Diaspora are considering to work through them)

3.  Experience with donations managment
Goods and funding can be sent to  Rotary Ethiopia office ( money, it is not taxable and if they  receive goods required for the COVID-19 pandemic, they are duty free) 

4.Transportation within the country can be covered by the  recipient. Rotary can do the liaising and cover the cost in that respect.

5. Negotiation on behalf for  cargo with Ethiopian airlines( this depends on thr airline but we have had great relation with th previously)

6.100% of the money or  goods received from partners in the country or from abroad goes  to the intended recipient.  If there is any overhead, Rotary will cover that.

7.Can provide list of top priority items in their  area of focus which is protecting and increasing the efficiency of the national health service.

8.Advise and assist to comply with the local requirements to get cash contributions tax free and despatched goods from abroad cleared through customs duty free.

9.Provide execution report supported by video clips and/or photographs and official receipts and acknowledgements from the concerned government office after delivery of the intended services to the target beneficiaries.

We can contact PDG Teshome covid task force chair Rotary Ethiopia or <@U011J5MQY3E> 

<@U010B7Q6XE0>  <@U0107A7161E>  <@U011F7L4G8L>  please give me the list of the activities we can do to  partner with Rotary

elements.text: Partnership with Rotary is a go

🥳

I had a confirmation from the Rotary covid task force  chair of Ethiopia

 Rotary  has been functional in Ethiopia for over 60 years and have assisted the country in many impactful projects.
Rotray family includes Rotary, Rotaract and interact. There are many clubs and volunteers within the country and have one country office.

 Currently Rotary is  already working on the ground and  has different partnership to combat COVID.Most of the resources used so far have come from local clubs and WHO has also assisted.

The two main focuses they  picked supporting MoH or  the national health service by;
 a) protecting its personnel from being infected themselves and 
b) equipping them with  necessary hard and software  that can increase their productivity and efficacy. 

How can they support us 

1, Have right partnership
(Rotary have designed strategies and action initiatives which are very much appreciated and recognized by the counter parts: the ministty of health and ministry of peace)

2.Have legal mandate in Ethiopia as a registered not for profit, non-political and non-religious network of volunteers (hence Several members and groups in the Ethiopian Diaspora are considering to work through them)

3.  Experience with donations managment
Goods and funding can be sent to  Rotary Ethiopia office ( money, it is not taxable and if they  receive goods required for the COVID-19 pandemic, they are duty free) 

4.Transportation within the country can be covered by the  recipient. Rotary can do the liaising and cover the cost in that respect.

5. Negotiation on behalf for  cargo with Ethiopian airlines( this depends on thr airline but we have had great relation with th previously)

6.100% of the money or  goods received from partners in the country or from abroad goes  to the intended recipient.  If there is any overhead, Rotary will cover that.

7.Can provide list of top priority items in their  area of focus which is protecting and increasing the efficiency of the national health service.

8.Advise and assist to comply with the local requirements to get cash contributions tax free and despatched goods from abroad cleared through customs duty free.

9.Provide execution report supported by video clips and/or photographs and official receipts and acknowledgements from the concerned government office after delivery of the intended services to the target beneficiaries.

We can contact PDG Teshome covid task force chair Rotary Ethiopia or
please give me the list of the activities we can do to  partner with Rotary

text: This is great! Thanks for getting this together, Ruth. It sounds like they're able to do much more than just help with our current initiatives, so they might be able to help out other workstreams. Are you going to be on the All Hands call tonight? Maybe you can mention this to the entire group.

text:
A few questions:
• "Transportation within the country can be covered by the recipient" - does this mean they can support with delivery for care packages (to the woredas)? 
• Are there any initiatives they are working on right now where our group can support them?

attachments.fallback: [April 10th, 2020 8:03 AM] sewasewh2: <!here> Hi everyone, There is a start up company that is opening their services earlier than planed to support social distancing efforts in Ethiopia. They provide delivery service for local ethiopian vendors. They started vendor registration this week. Reach out to them if any one would like their services or would like to support them get the word out. <https://hamoosit.com/en/>
